history: TTS <speak> Welcome to CMU GetGoing <break time='1s' />.
TTS <speak> How would you like to travel today? <break strength='strong'/> I can give you public transit directions or driving directions. </speak>
USER driving directions
TTS <speak> No problem. <break strength='strong' /> I will give you driving directions to your destination. <break time='800ms'/> </speak>
TTS Where do you wanna go? For example, you can say I'm going to Murray and Forbes
USER I'm going to Craig and Forbes.
TTS Did you say that you wanted to go to forbes avenue and south craig st?
USER Actually, I want to go to CMU.
TTS Did you say that you wanted to go to carnegie mellon university?
USER That's correct.
TTS Where do you wanna leave from?
USER I'm leaving from Ellsworth and Negley.
TTS Did you say that you were leaving from ellsworth avenue and south negley avenue?
USER right
TTS When would you like to travel?
USER 8 P.M.
TTS Okay, travelling at 08:00 pm.
TTS <speak> Would you like me to pause after every step to give you time to write things down? </speak>
USER No.
TTS <speak> Sounds good. <break strength='strong' /> Let me know if you didn't understand a step, and I'll repeat it for you. </speak>
TTS <speak> Just a minute. Let me look up the directions. </speak>
USER yes

TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> There are 3 available routes, to hear a different route say ALTERNATE ROUTE. The amount of time your trip will take is approximately 5 minutes.<break time='800ms'/>If you would like to go by bus instead, please say start over, and then choose public transit.<break time='800ms'/> The first thing that you want to do <break strength='weak'/> is to Head southeast on south Negley avenue toward Elmer St. </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Shall I move onto the next step? </speak>
USER Yeah move on.
TTS <speak> Next, <break strength='weak'/> you should Turn right onto Dunmoyle St. </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Shall I move onto the next step? </speak>
USER continue
TTS <speak> Next, <break strength='weak'/> you should Turn left onto Wilkins avenue. </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Are you ready for the next step? </speak>
USER Yeah next.
TTS <speak> Next, <break strength='weak'/> you should Sharp right onto Beeler St. </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Are you ready for the next step? </speak>
USER Yeah, I'm ready.
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Are you ready for the next step? </speak>
USER Yes.
TTS <speak> The final step <break strength='weak'/> is to Turn right onto Forbes avenue. Destination will be on the left. </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Shall I move onto the next step? </speak>
USER Yes.
TTS <speak> </speak>
TTS <speak> Would you like to hear an alternate route?</speak>
USER No.
TTS <speak> Were the provided directions useful? </speak>
USER Yes.
TTS <speak> Would you use GetGoing again? </speak>
USER Yep.
TTS Thank you for using CMU Get Going. If you would like to plan another trip, say <break strength='weak' /> RESTART.
